name: Can't Help But Vacuum | 199 TriJam Entry
name_original: Can't Help But Vacuum | 199 TriJam Entry
description:
Can't help but vacuum is a TriJam entry that is inspired by "Sun Yuan And Peng YU Cant Help myself" Art installation.  

You play as a vacuum that just began leaking liquid energy and its your job to vacuum it back up to regain your energy so you don't run out of power and rust in peace. 

CONTROLS| 
W = Forward         A = Left
S = Backwards      D = Right

ESC = Exit Game

Left click to interact with UI

Music used by: Joshuuu / https://joshuuu.itch.io/short-loopable-background-music
